mapper.select:
SELECT
wo.id AS officialAccountId, wo.accountType AS accountType, wo.wx_type AS wxType, wo.wx_openid AS originalId, wo.nickName AS wxName, wo.appid AS appId, wo.appSecret AS secret, wo.token AS token, wo.encodingAesKey AS aesKey, wo.messageUrl AS messageUrl, wo.created AS createTime, wo.updated AS updateTime, wo.deleted AS deleteTage FROM wx_official_account wo
